content.title: Global_Site_Id_desc
content.information: Unique Global identifier of Shell site or competitor site.

content.title: Site_Name_desc
content.information: Name of the Site. (Due to the restrictions in receiveing systems/applications site name must be shorter than 35 characters)

content.title: Site_Short_Name_desc
content.information: Shortened name for the site. Maximum 20 characters

content.title: Site_Street_Address_desc
content.information: Part of the site's physical address specifying the name of the street the site is located on and/or the location of site on the street such as house number, plot number, milestone location etc.

content.title: City_Name_desc
content.information: Part of the site's physical address specifying the name of the city the site is located in.

content.title: City_code_desc
content.information: Part of the site's address specifying the city code. Not all countries in the world have city codes.

content.title: Country_desc
content.information: Part of site's address specifying the name of the country the site is located in. Controlled by the Reference table containing a list of all the countries in the world.

content.title: Site_Status_desc
content.information: Text indicating the operational status of the site such as  Work In Progress, Active, Closed Temporarily, Closed Permanently, Landbank etc

content.title: County_Name_desc
content.information: Part of site's address specifying the name of the county the site is located in. Controlled by the Reference table containing a list of all the counties in given countries. Not all countries in the world have counties.

content.title: Territory_Name_desc
content.information: Part of Site's physical address specifying the state, province or the region within the country the site is located in. In the US, the state  will be used as territory. (Note the value stored here as part of site's physical address has not relation to or is not same as the territory of site's Sales Hierarchy)

content.title: Postal_Code_desc
content.information: Part of site's address specifying the Postal Code for the site's address. Not all country's addresses have postal code

content.title: Tel_Country_Code_desc
content.information: The international dialling code for the country the site is situated in.

content.title: Telephone_Number_desc
content.information: Site's telephone number including country code and area code

content.title: Fax_Number_desc
content.information: The fax number for the site (includes area code).

content.title: Latitude_desc
content.information: The exact number of degrees north (+ve) or south (-ve) of the equator, measured to six decimal points

content.title: Longitude_desc
content.information: The exact number of degrees east (+ve) or west (-ve) of the Greenwich meridian, measured to six decimal points

content.title: Trading_Hours_desc
content.information: Trading hours (number of hours shop open).

content.title: Site_Shop_Format_Type_desc
content.information: Type of shop at the site.

content.title: Loyalty_Program_Indicator_desc
content.information: Indicates if the site is participating in a loyalty program.

content.title: Product_At_Site_Alternative_Fuel_(Yes_/_No)_desc
content.information: This product is not available in the local market.

content.title: Product_At_Site_CNG_(Yes/_No)_desc
content.information: This product is not available in the local market.

content.title: Product_At_Site_LPG_(Yes/No)_desc

content.information: This product is not available in the local market.

content.information: This product is not available in the local market.

content.title: Product_At_Site_Premium_Mogas_(Yes/No)_desc
content.information: This product is not available in the local market.

content.title: Product_At_Site_Low_Octane_Gasoline_(Yes/No)_desc
content.information: This product is not available in the local market.

content.title: Product_At_Site_Auto/RV_Propane_(Yes/No)_desc
content.information: This product is not available in the local market.

content.title: Product_At_Site_Adblue_at_Pump_(Yes/No)_desc
content.information: This product is not available in the local market.

content.title: Product_At_Site_Hydrogen_(Yes/No)_desc
content.information: This product is not available in the local market.

content.title: Product_At_Site_Kerosene_(Yes/No)_desc
content.information: This product is not available in the local market.

content.title: Product_At_Site_Super_Premium_Gasoline_(Yes/No)_desc
content.information: This product is not available in the local market.

content.title: Product_At_Site_Unleaded_Super_(Yes/No)_desc
content.information: This product is not available in the local market.

content.title: Product_At_Site_Truck_Diesel_(Yes/No)_desc
content.information: This product is not available in the local market.

content.title: Product_At_Site_Super_98_(Yes/No)_desc
content.information: This product is not available in the local market.

content.title: Product_At_Site_GTL_(Yes/No)_desc
content.information: This product is not available in the local market.

content.title: Product_At_Site_Fuelsave_98_(Yes/No)_desc
content.information: This product is not available in the local market.

content.title: Facility_Air_&_Water_(Yes/No)_desc
content.information: Air and water facilities are available for the use of customers, with or without charge

content.title: Facility_ATM_(Yes/No)_desc
content.information: On site there is a cash withdrawal machine present (an ATM - auto teller machine)

content.title: Facility_Automotive_LPG_(Yes/No)_desc
content.information: At least one pump available that dispenses Automotive LPG

content.title: Facility_Bakery_Shop_(Yes/No)_desc
content.information: Site offers special bakery products in the shop

content.title: Facility_Bank_Note_Acceptor_(Yes_/_No)_desc
content.information: Payment can be made (to the pump or elsewhere) for fuel into a machine that accepts cash

content.title: Facility_Bar_(Yes/No)_desc
content.information: There is a Bar on site (selling alcoholic beverages)

content.title: Facility_Bottled_Gas_(Yes/No)_desc
content.information: Bottled gas (LPG) is sold (for heating etc.)

content.title: Facility_Canopy_(Yes/No)_desc
content.information: The forecourt is covered by a canopy (SEOP)

content.title: Facility_Car_Rental_(Yes/No)_desc
content.information: Cars can be rented from the site

content.title: Facility_Car_Wash_(Yes/No)_desc
content.information: The site has at least one Car Wash

content.title: Facility_Communication_Corner_(Yes/No)_desc
content.information: Communications facilities are available for the use of customers, e.g. phone, fax, Internet etc.

content.title: Facility_Credit_Cards_(Yes/No)_desc
content.information: The site accepts credit cards for payment

content.title: Facility_Type_External_Card_Reader_(Yes/No)_desc
content.information: Fuel can be paid for at the pump by the customer inserting a credit card into a reader in the pump

content.title: Facility_Type_Facilities_for_disabled_(Yes/No)_desc
content.information: Facilities for the disabled present, such as wheelchair access, special toilets, amplification systems at the point of sale for the hard of hearing etc.

content.title: Facility_Type_Fast_Food_Food_Service_(Yes/No)_desc
content.information: Fast food can be bought from the shop

content.title: Facility_Type_Fast_food_Counter_attended_(Yes/No)_desc
content.information: There is a staffed counter selling fast food

content.title: Facility_Type_Fuel_cards_(Yes/No)_desc
content.information: The site accepts Shell Fuel cards (and/or those of other companies) for payment

content.title: Facility_Type_HGV_Lane_(Yes/No)_desc
content.information: The fuel forecourt has an HGV lane

content.title: Facility_Type_Lottery_(Yes/No)_desc
content.information: National (or local) lottery tickets are sold by the site

content.title: Facility_Type_Loyalty_cards_(Yes/No)_desc
content.information: The site accepts Shell loyalty cards as part of a marketing promotion

content.title: Facility_Type_Parking_Place_(Yes/No)_desc
content.information: Parking places are available for the use of customers

content.title: Facility_Type_Paypoint_(Yes/No)_desc
content.information: The Site has a Paypoint installed (SOPE)

content.title: Facility_Type_Service_Bay_(Yes/No)_desc
content.information: The site has at least one Service Bay

content.title: Facility_Type_Third_Party_Rental_(Yes/No)_desc
content.information: Part of the site is used for other purposes and Shell only receives a rental income, rather than a direct income from that business

content.title: Facility_Type_Transponder_(Yes/No)_desc
content.information: Fuel can be paid for using a Transponder attached to the pump which some customers have a payment device for

content.title: Facility_Type_Truckport_(Yes/No)_desc
content.information: A separate set of filling lanes specifically for usage by truckers.

content.title: Facility_Type_Two_stroke_pre_mix_(Yes/No)_desc
content.information: Two-stroke fuel (for small motorbikes/lawn mowers) is sold

content.title: Facility_Type_Vacuum_(Yes/No)_desc
content.information: Vacuum facilities for the customer to clean their vehicles are available

content.title: Facility_Type_Water_Closet_/Toilet_(Yes/No)_desc
content.information: There is a toilet on the site which customers can use

content.title: Change_Request_Status_approved_desc
content.information: Change Requested approved and forwarded to GSAP/GSD master data maintenance team for action

content.title: Change_Request_Status_new_desc
content.information: Change Request submitted and will be reviewed

content.title: Change_Request_Status_Overwritten_desc
content.information: Change Request overwritten by more recent request for this field

content.title: Change_Request_Status_canceled_desc
content.information: Change Request cancelled by a more recent update from GSD

content.title: Site_master_data_maintenance_desc
content.information: App users can submit change request (CR) to update site data. CR will be approved or rejected by local market operational support team. Once approved, the CR will be implemented in GSD/GSAP by relevant master data maintenance teams. Updates in CR status can be seen in the CR History page of the app.
